title: The Writer's Almanac for Sunday, December 5, 2021
description: "Do not whine... Do not complain. Work harder. Spend more time alone." – Joan Didion, born on this day in 1934.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: "Do not whine... Do not complain. Work harder. Spend more time alone." – Joan Didion, born on this day in 1934.
